archimate:BusinessService.name: Current Account
archimate:BusinessService.documentation:
Example of use:
A customer processes a series of services (e.g., request printed statements, initiate a transfer, set up a standing order) through the call center using their current account
General comment:
The Current Account or Demand Deposit Account as it can be called is a financial facility that represents the general checking account facility at the core of the consumer and small business banking activity. There is a range of supporting features that make up the standard facility (checks/cheques, standing orders, debit cards, phone and on-line banking services etc.). The fulfillment will include a range of optional services, fees and interest payments and penalties and will often be bundled and or underlie/support other financial facilities and financial transactions
Business Purpose : Orchestrate a consumer checking/demand deposit account with typical range of services and fees
Пример использования:
Клиент обрабатывает ряд услуг (например, запрашивает распечатанные выписки, инициирует перевод, оформляет постоянный заказ) через колл-центр, используя свой текущий счет
Общее замечание:
Текущий счет или депозитный счет до востребования, как его можно назвать, представляет собой финансовый механизм, который представляет собой общий расчетный счет в основе банковской деятельности потребителей и малого бизнеса. Существует целый ряд вспомогательных функций, которые составляют стандартный объект (чеки, постоянные поручения, дебетовые карты, телефонные и он-лайн банковских услуг и т. д.). Выполнение будет включать в себя ряд дополнительных услуг, сборов и процентных платежей и штрафов и часто будет в комплекте и или лежать в основе/поддержки других финансовых средств и финансовых операций
деловая цель : Организовать потребителя проверочный/ депозитный счет до востребования с типичным спектром услуг и сборов
Service Domain - Current Account The Current Account or Demand Deposit Account as it can be called is a financial facility that represents the general checking account facility at the core of the consumer and small business banking activity. There is a range of supporting features that make up the standard facility (checks/cheques, standing orders, debit cards, phone and on-line banking services etc.). The fulfillment can include a range of optional services, fees and interest payments and penalties and will often be bundled and or underlie/support other financial facilities and financial transactions.
Detailed Summary This service domain orchestrates a consumer checking/demand deposit account. The typical range of services and fees covers payments and deposits, standing orders, sweeps, liens, check and debit card access.
Executive Summary This service domain orchestrates a consumer checking/demand deposit account. The typical range of services and fees covers payments and deposits, standing orders, sweeps, liens, check and debit card access.
Examples Of Use A customer processes a series of services (e.g., request printed statements, initiate a transfer, set up a standing order) through the call center by accessing their current account.
